Sauer Brands, Inc., was founded as The C.F. Sauer Company in 1887 in Richmond, VA. Today, the company has a broad portfolio of packaged food products including condiments, spices, sauces and salad dressing — all made with inspired ingredients and flavors that excite consumers.

t: Private equity owner of Sauer Brands explores sale of condiments maker, sources say | Reuters
s: April 25, 2024 - The private equity owner of Sauer Brands is exploring a sale of the 137-year-old maker of condiments and spices that could value it at more than $1 billion, including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.
